results.overview: Modern Stone Age family the Flintstones hit the big screen in this live-action version of the classic cartoon. Fred helps Barney adopt a child. Barney sees an opportunity to repay him when Slate Mining tests its employees to find a new executive. But no good deed goes unpunished.
results.title: The Flintstones

results.original_title: The Flintstones & WWE: Stone Age SmackDown!
results.overview: The WWE comes to town in the new animated film teaming the Flintstones with Bedrock-ready versions of John Cena, Daniel Bryan and more.
results.title: The Flintstones & WWE: Stone Age SmackDown!

results.original_title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
results.overview: The Flintstones are at it again. The Flintstones and the Rubbles head for Rock Vegas with Fred hoping to court the lovely Wilma. Nothing will stand in the way of love, except for the conniving Chip Rockefeller who is the playboy born in Baysville but who has made it in the cutthroat town of Rock Vegas. Will Fred win Wilma's love?
results.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas

results.overview: Elroy Jetson invents a time machine that takes him back to prehistoric times, where he meets the Flintstone family.
results.title: The Jetsons Meet the Flintstones

results.overview: With their marriage on the rocks, Fred and Wilma take a holiday together to rekindle the fire in their relationship.
results.title: The Flintstones: On the Rocks

results.overview: Wilma is a celebrity when she gets a shot at the big leagues and becomes a pitcher for the Bedrock Dodgers after nailing a couple of robbers with a melon at the grocery store; however, she and Fred argue over her ambition to pitch for the team because Fred thinks a woman's place is in the home.
results.title: The Flintstones: Wind-Up Wilma

results.overview: Fred is annoyed when an eerie new house is built next door, inhabited by the Frankenstone family.
results.title: The Flintstones' New Neighbors

results.original_title: The Flintstones : Hollyrock a Bye Baby
results.overview: Newlyweds Pebbles Flintstone and Bamm Bamm Rubble are expecting a newborn, so Fred and Wilma head for Hollyrock to help them cope.
results.title: The Flintstones : Hollyrock a Bye Baby

results.original_title: The Flintstones Meet Rockula and Frankenstone
results.overview: The Flintstones and the Rubbles win a trip on "Make a Deal or Don't" to Count Rockula's castle in Rocksylvania, where they have an unpleasant meeting with the Count and his servant, Frankenstone.
results.title: The Flintstones Meet Rockula and Frankenstone

results.overview: Fred manages a little league baseball team that seems absolutely hopeless, except for a player that he blindly refuses to recognize.
results.title: The Flintstones: Little Big League

results.overview: Due to a mix-up at the doctor's office, Fred believes he has only 24 hours left to live.
results.title: The Flintstones: Fred's Final Fling

results.overview: Animated feature film based on the TV series, "The Flintstones".
results.title: The Flintstones

results.overview: After failing his annual physical, Fred wants to prove to everyone that he is in shape, so he decides to become the first citizen of Bedrock to enter the Rockstone Marathon.
results.title: The Flintstones: Jogging Fever

results.overview: A live-action and animated television special featuring clips from past episodes and spin-offs combined with new animation and musical segments.
results.title: The Flintstones' 25th Anniversary Celebration

results.overview: A cave-less kid comes to live with the Flintstones on Christmas and ends up getting himself and Fred stuck in prison right before Fred is going to play Santa Claus in the Bedrock parade.
results.title: The Flintstones Christmas in Bedrock

results.original_title: Carved in Stone: The Flintstones Phenomenon
results.overview: Animation experts reflect on the enduring popularity of the Flintstones.
results.title: Carved in Stone: The Flintstones Phenomenon

results.overview: Fred works as a department store Santa to pick up some extra holiday cash. He is so successful that the real Santa Claus, who is ill, asks him to take over delivering toys on Christmas Eve. Fred does, but in his rush he forgets to deliver presents to his own house. To his delight, he finds Santa has already taken care of it.
results.title: Christmas Flintstone

results.overview: A grown-up Pebbles and Bamm-Bamm decide to get married.
results.title: I Yabba Dabba Do!

results.original_title: The Flintstone Kids' "Just Say No" Special
results.overview: A special that shows the young Flintstones trying to raise money so they can go to a concert. The story takes a turn when older kids try to push drugs on them.
results.title: The Flintstone Kids' "Just Say No" Special
